column4: Can someone please discuss with me the following: 'sudo tar -C /opt -zxvf firefox-2.0.tar.gz'   I do not understand -C and -zxvf
-C means that the archive will be extracted into /opt
and -zxvf means, in order, decompress, extract, be verbose and use the following file
indeed, reading 'man tar' is a good idea
